option.label: Enable Logging
option.help: When checked, various game events are logged to a text file using eotinb's AutoLog mod.

option.label: Start Automatically
option.help: When checked, the logger is automatically started with no in-game message.

option.label: Use Default File Name
option.help: When checked, the default (playername.txt) will be used, ignores log file name option.

option.label: Path
option.help: Directory where log file resides (fully qualified path, i.e. C:\folder\subfolder or blank).

option.label: File
option.help: Name of log file. If there is no file of this name in the directory above, one will be created.

list.values: Plain|HTML Tags|Forum Tags, with '' around color codes|Forum Tags, no '' around color codes
list.label: Format Style
list.help: The format of the log output.

option.label: Color Coding
option.help: When checked, comments are color-coded for forum posts.

list.label: 200000BC is Turn
list.help: Select which turn number 200000BC should be.

option.label: Show IBT
option.help: When checked, the logger inserts IBT (in between turns) at the end of the player's turn.

option.label: Prefix
option.help: Used as a prefix before user entries in the log [use ALT + E], e.g. your nick.

option.label: Technologies
option.help: When checked, will log techs acquired and research started.

option.label: Builds Started
option.help: When checked, will log when a city starts a build.

option.label: Builds Completed
option.help: When checked, will log when a city completes a build.

option.label: Projects Completed
option.help: When checked, will log completion of projects (certain wonders are technically projects -- other wonders are treated like normal buildings).

option.label: Improvements
option.help: When checked, will log when your improvements are built or destroyed by you.

option.label: Sliders
option.help: When checked, will log the sliders each turn.

option.label: City Founded
option.help: When checked, will log when you found a city.

option.label: City Growth
option.help: When checked, will log when one of your cities grows in population.

option.label: City Borders
option.help: When checked, will log when one of your city\'s borders expand.

option.label: City Ownership
option.help: When checked, will log when you acquire or lose a city through conquest or trade.

option.label: City Razed
option.help: When checked, will log when you raze another civ\'s city or one of your cities is razed.

option.label: City Whip
option.help: When checked, will log when you whip a city or when the whip anger decreases in a city.

option.label: Tribal Villages
option.help: When checked, will log results from popping tribal villages.

option.label: Religions
option.help:
When checked, will log
1. When you found a religion
2. Spread of any religion to your cities
 3. Spread of religions whose Holy city you control to foreign cities

option.label: Corporations
option.help:
When checked, will log
1. When you found a corporation
2. Spread of any corporation to your cities
 3. Spread of corporation whose headquarters you control to foreign cities

option.label: Great People
option.help: When checked, will log the birth of great people (in your cities).

option.label: Golden Age
option.help: When checked, will log begin and end of your Golden Ages.

option.label: Contact
option.help: When checked, will log first contact with other civs.

option.label: Attitude
option.help: When checked, will log any change in attitude between civs known to you.

option.label: War
option.help: When checked, will log start and end of wars between civs known to you.

option.label: Vassal States
option.help: When checked, will log when any civ becomes a vassal state of or frees itself from another.

option.label: Civics
option.help: When checked, will log any change in civics of civs known to you.

option.label: Combat
option.help: When checked, will log combat results involving your units.

option.label: Promotions
option.help: When checked, will log when you promote one of your units.

option.label: Pillaging
option.help: When checked, will log when you pillage or your improvements are pillaged.

option.label: TradeOffer
option.help: When checked, will log AI-initiated trades and gift offers and your responses.

option.label: TributeDemand
option.help: When checked, will log AI demands for tribute or help and your responses.

option.label: ReligionDemand
option.help: When checked, will log AI demands that you change religion and your responses.

option.label: CivicDemand
option.help: When checked, will log AI demands that you change civics and your responses.

option.label: WarDemand
option.help: When checked, will log AI requests to declare war on a third party and your responses.

option.label: EmbargoDemand
option.help: When checked, will log AI requests to stop trading with a third party and your responses.
